content: @Rick Geimer @Sarah Gaunt @Sean McIlvenna Several people have asked me about the CDA logical model and/or CDA mapping using the mapping language, and I'm now getting to working on that (I've been putting support for logical models and mapping in the IG Publisher so far)
now that I'm ready to work on it, should I build that into the CCDA on FHIR IG, or do it as a separate piece of work?
I've update the CDA logical model for changes to StructureDefinition
